name: Shooty Arrow
description:
Shooty Arrow is a free archery game with absolutely NO ADS OR IN APP PURCHASES! We were so tired of all the junk archery apps on the app store, that take advantage and spam the users with endless ads or in app purchase request. That is why we made this game NON PROFIT AND FREE FOR LIFE!

Shoot the arrows at the twisting circle target, but make sure you don't hit the other arrows that you previously show!

Features:
◉ Over 1000+ fun and challenging levels, hundreds of hours of entertainment
◉ Addictive gameplay, tested and crafted for perfection
◉ Global leaderboard
◉ FREE FOR LIFE, NO ADS OR IN APP PURCHASES
